description: Retrieves the contents of the encrypted fields SecretString or SecretBinary from the specified version of a secret, whichever contains content.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Attackers can use retrieved secrets to log into cloud accounts or services, expanding their control over the cloud environment.
Accessing secrets via GetSecretValue provides insights into cloud resource configurations and other details useful for discovering and mapping the cloud infrastructure.
Retrieving secrets may give attackers information about the system, such as environment configurations, which helps them understand the environment they are targeting.

incidents.description: LUCR-3: SCATTERED SPIDER GETTING SAAS-Y IN THE CLOUD
Muddled Libra’s Evolution to the Cloud

securityImplications: Attackers might use GetSecretValue to illicitly access sensitive information stored in the SecretsManager.
